name: TIME ROLL!
description:
TIME ROLL! is a simple 2D action game where you play with three different characters, in different settings.

This is a very small project made in only 2 days, so it's very unpolished. One of the characters might get a  full, polished game,  who knows?

Music and SFX:

 https://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/

https://freesound.org

Sprites: 

https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/40094

https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/18720

https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/34852

Special Thanks to Bluememories Studio for doing the MainMenu Artwork!
